item.title: 日本债券大跌波及全球，国债下跌
item.description: 由于日本债务下滑波及全球债券市场，国债在感恩节后的一周开始时表现不佳。【原文：Treasuries started the post-Thanksgiving week on the backfoot as a slide in Japanese debt spilled over into bond markets globally.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷因与莫桑比克贷款有关的洗钱行为而被起诉
item.description: 瑞士检察官指控瑞士信贷未能防止洗钱活动，这些活动与该银行向莫桑比克提供贷款以建立捕鱼船队有关，这就是后来的金枪鱼债券丑闻。【原文：Swiss prosecutors charged Credit Suisse with failing to prevent money laundering linked to loans the lender provided to Mozambique to build a fishing fleet in what became the tuna bond scandal.】

item.title: 贡渥集团亿万富翁首席执行官托恩奎斯特将辞职并将股权出售给员工
item.description: 贡渥集团所有者兼首席执行官托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjörn Törnqvist）将卸任，并将其在这家能源交易商的多数股权出售给高级员工，而就在几周前，该公司还被美国政府贴上了克里姆林宫 "傀儡 "的标签。【原文：Gunvor Group owner and Chief Executive Officer Torbjörn Törnqvist will step down and sell his majority stake in the energy trader to senior staff, just weeks after the company was labeled a “puppet” of the Kremlin by the US government.】

item.title: 无人机训练营：陆军演习测试士兵、技术和未来计划
item.description: 训练表明，整合无人机等新系统并非易事。指挥官们打赌，这些经常令人沮丧的教训将在战场上得到回报。【原文：The training showed integrating new systems such as drones is not easy. Commanders are betting the often-frustrating lessons will pay off on the battlefield.】

item.title: 塑料杯亿万富翁将财富转移到新的 "罪恶股票 "赌注上
item.description: 亿万富翁肯尼思-达特（Kenneth Dart）是开曼群岛的一位隐居者，他是其家族同名塑料杯财富的继承人。现在，他把目光转向了另一种恶习。【原文：Billionaire Kenneth Dart, the reclusive, Cayman Islands-based heir to his family’s eponymous plastic-cup fortune, made $4 billion from a contrarian bet on Big Tobacco. Now, he’s turned his attention to another vice.】

item.title: 软银之子 "哭诉 "出售英伟达股份以资助人工智能赌注
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）创始人孙正义（Masayoshi Son）说，如果他的公司有无限的资金来支持其在人工智能领域的下一步投资，他就不会抛售英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的股票。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. founder Masayoshi Son said he wouldn’t have sold off Nvidia Corp. shares if his company had unlimited money to bankroll its next investments in artificial intelligence, which include a big bet on OpenAI.】

item.title: 中国万科要求在延期计划下支付 12 个月的债券
item.description: 上周，中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China Vanke Co., the distressed builder that surprised markets last week when it proposed an unspecified delay in paying a local bond, has now asked holders to wait a year to be made whole, as it faces mounting liquidity pressure amid waning state support.】

item.title: 亿万富翁贝纳通家族成立私人市场投资公司
item.description: 贝纳通家族的控股公司 Edizione 正在成立一家另类投资公司，管理着约 30 亿欧元（35 亿美元）的资产，以寻求发展其私人市场。【原文：The Benetton family’s holding company Edizione is setting up an alternative investment firm with about €3 billion ($3.5 billion) in assets under management as it seeks to grow its private markets.】

item.title: 英国 10 月抵押贷款审批因担心税收增加而下降
item.description: 由于担心预算案将针对英国房地产市场增税，潜在购房者暂时搁置了购房决定，因此 10 月份的住房贷款需求略有下降。【原文：Demand for home loans fell slightly in October as prospective buyers put decisions on ice amid fears of tax rises targeting the UK property market in the budget.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金计划将在日本的投资增加一倍以上
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的主权财富基金希望到 2030 年底将其在日本的投资增加到约 270 亿美元，因为沙特希望深化与亚洲的关系，并拓展从关键矿产到金融市场等领域。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is looking to increase its investments in Japan to about $27 billion by the end of 2030 as the kingdom looks to deepen ties in Asia and expand in areas from critical minerals to financial markets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚矿商加强黄金勘探以从反弹中获益
item.description: 随着今年黄金价格飙升至历史新高，澳大利亚矿商正在加大黄金勘探力度，寻找新的矿藏。【原文：Australian miners are ramping up gold exploration as prices that have surged to a record high this year spur a search for new deposits.】

item.title: 瑞银称，尽管法郎飙升，但瑞士央行 10 月份仍未采取干预措施
item.description: 根据瑞银集团基于资产负债表数据的计算，瑞士国家银行可能没有在 10 月份介入货币市场来阻止法郎的避风港走势。【原文：The Swiss National Bank probably didn’t step into currency markets in October to stop the haven run of the franc, according to UBS calculations based on balance sheet data.】

item.title: 南非工厂气氛降至科维德封锁以来最差
item.description: 由于出口销售仍然疲软，制造业也在努力获得牵引力，南非制造商的情绪跌至自19科维德大流行期间实施封锁以来的最弱水平。【原文：Sentiment among South African manufacturers plunged to the weakest level since lockdowns were implemented during the Covid-19 pandemic, as export sales remain weak and the manufacturing industry struggles to gain traction.】

item.title: 中国旅游警告重创松屋银座免税店销售额
item.description: 日本零售商松屋株式会社（Matsuya Co.）的银座旗舰店上个月的免税销售额比去年同期下降了约 15%，这是日本零售业受到与中国的地缘政治紧张局势冲击的第一个迹象。【原文：Duty-free sales at Japanese retailer Matsuya Co.’s flagship Ginza stores fell about 15% last month from a year earlier, marking the first sign that Japan’s retail sector is being hit by geopolitical tensions with China.】

item.title: 卢比下跌拖累 Nifty 50 指数，此前该指数曾短暂创下历史新高
item.description: 印度 Nifty 50 指数和印度货币周一似乎步调一致，拖累了早盘一度创下日内纪录的股指。【原文：India’s Nifty 50 index and its currency appeared to move in lockstep on Monday, weighing down a stock gauge that touched an intra-day record during morning trading.】

item.title: 资产缩水后，Altice 国际债券跌幅创历史新高
item.description: 周五下午，Altice International 宣布已将部分资产转移至债权人无法触及的范围之外，这一旨在稳定其财务状况的激进举措导致该公司债券周一创下历史最大跌幅。【原文：Altice International’s bonds plunged the most on record on Monday following an announcement on Friday afternoon that the company had shifted some assets out of the reach of creditors, in an aggressive move aimed at stabilizing its finances.】

item.title: 罗氏潜在大片助推 1997 年以来最好的一个月
item.description: 罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）的股价刚刚创下了自 1997 年以来最好的一个月，这得益于对一种实验性乳腺癌药物的乐观预期和令人鼓舞的试验结果。分析师认为，该公司股价将进一步上涨。【原文：Roche Holding AG’s shares just posted their best month since 1997, lifted by optimism over an experimental breast cancer pill and encouraging trial results. Analysts see further gains ahead.】

item.title: CCI Global将斥资3亿多美元拓展非洲业务
item.description: CCI Global 是非洲一家主要的呼叫中心运营商，未来两年将投资约 3.78 亿美元，以加强在欧洲、中东和非洲的运营。【原文：CCI Global, a major call center operator in Africa, will invest about $378 million over the next two years to strengthen operations across Europe, the Middle East and Africa.】

item.title: 欧洲人盘点中国控制关键商品的巨大成本
item.description: 据一项调查显示，中国的出口管制正迫使欧洲公司重新思考如何运营，因为中国的出口管制增加了额外成本，就一家公司而言，额外成本可能超过 2.5 亿欧元（约合 2.9 亿美元）。【原文：Chinese export controls are forcing European companies to rethink how they operate, according to a survey, after piling on additional costs that could exceed €250 million ($290 million) in the case of one firm.】

item.title: 泰国央行提出新外汇规则以缓解泰铢压力
item.description: 在泰铢在过去一周升值约 1%之后，泰国央行计划推出更多措施来缓解泰铢的升值压力，并加强对与黄金有关的外汇交易的监管。【原文：The Bank of Thailand plans to roll out additional measures to ease appreciation pressure on the baht and tighten oversight of gold-related foreign-exchange transactions after the currency strengthened about 1% over the past week.】

item.title: 普京允许中国公民免签入境俄罗斯
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京签署命令，允许中国公民免签入境，两国关系继续深化。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin signed an order to allow visa-free entry into the country for Chinese citizens as ties between the two nations continue to deepen.】

item.title: 韩国历史性数据泄露事件为创纪录的网络泄露年画上句号
item.description: 韩国最大的网络零售商 Coupang Inc.发生大规模数据泄露事件，使韩国今年的网络泄密事件创下新高，凸显了首尔网络防御的薄弱环节。【原文：A massive data breach at South Korea’s largest e-retailer Coupang Inc. caps what is set to be a record year for online leaks in the country, highlighting weaknesses in Seoul’s cyber defenses.】

item.title: 据称哈萨克斯坦自由控股公司酝酿收购土耳其银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，哈萨克斯坦公司自由控股公司（Freedom Holding Corp.【原文：Kazakh company Freedom Holding Corp. is holding talks to buy TurkishBank AS, according to people with knowledge of the discussions.】

item.title: 空中客车公司称绝大多数 A320 飞机接受了改装
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）表示，受软件故障影响的约6000架A320系列飞机中的绝大多数已在上周末接受了必要的修改，从而帮助这家欧洲飞机制造商避免了更大范围的故障，这也是该公司迄今为止最大规模的召回行动。【原文：Airbus SE said the vast majority of the about 6,000 A320-family aircraft impacted by a software glitch have received the necessary modification over the weekend, helping the European planemaker sidestep a wider disruption in what has become the company’s largest recall to date.】

item.title: 土耳其第三季度经济放缓，有望进一步降息
item.description: 土耳其第三季度经济年增长率的放缓幅度超过预期，这为央行继续降低利率提供了空间。【原文：Turkey’s economy slowed more than expected on an annual basis in the third quarter, providing the central bank with scope to continue lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 中央银行退出，印度卢比跌至历史新低
item.description: 印度卢比兑美元汇率创下历史新低，因为交易商称印度储备银行已不再维护该货币。【原文：The Indian rupee hit a fresh all-time low against the dollar, as traders said the Reserve Bank of India had stepped away from defending the currency.】

item.title: 金多斯称德科斯是出色的行长，但无法锁定拉加德的欧洲央行职位
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯称赞了同为西班牙人的巴勃罗-埃尔南德斯-德科斯的优点，但拒绝透露这是否使他有望在两年后接替克里斯蒂娜-拉加德担任欧洲中央银行行长。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos extolled the virtues of fellow Spaniard Pablo Hernandez de Cos but declined to say if that put him on track to succeed Christine Lagarde as ECB president in two years.】
